TopicTitle: Single EVA and Crew report limitation

Articles.Content:
Hello, long time listener first time caller.

I don't agree with the move to a single eve and crew report. I understand that I can EVA save data, board, and do another crew report in another biome. I completely agree that you should only be able to do one report per biome. I just think we should be able to do a report for multiple biomes without having to do a song and dance.

I'm sure it was done for a reason, so i would be interested in hearing why it was decided as its more than possible that i'm missing something.

Thanks again and keep it up,

Gadgetmerc
